author: ryanleeschneider
content: <@!301186049323958275> I believe the same changes that were recently made to EIP-2930 in https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3260 also need to be applied to EIP-1559 here: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blame/master/EIPS/eip-1559.md#L44  If I'm not mistaken this is a consensus change and thus might impact any plans for testing tomorrow, ya? /cc <@!552133098075193354>

author: ryanleeschneider
content: (I guess it depends on the nature of the test, if it's load/throughput related then probably OK to proceed, but if it's correctness related maybe better to wait?)

author: timbeiko
content: It's a throughput test that is already on an old version of the spec, but thanks for flagging <@!388751025789468672> !
